EN_RULE_ATTRIB_T.RULE_ATTRIB_DESC: Attribute to identify the Requestor Name field of the Purchase Order Document
EN_RULE_ATTRIB_T.RULE_ATTRIB_LBL_TXT: Kuali Purchase Order Document Requestor Name

EN_RULE_ATTRIB_T.RULE_ATTRIB_DESC: Attribute to identify the Delivery Campus field of the Purchase Order Document
EN_RULE_ATTRIB_T.RULE_ATTRIB_LBL_TXT: Kuali Purchase Order Document Delivery Campus

EN_RULE_ATTRIB_T.RULE_ATTRIB_DESC: Attribute to identify the Vendor Name field of the Purchase Order Document
EN_RULE_ATTRIB_T.RULE_ATTRIB_LBL_TXT: Kuali Purchase Order Document Vendor Name

EN_RULE_ATTRIB_T.RULE_ATTRIB_DESC: Attribute to identify the Contract Manager of the Purchase Order Document using the Contract Manager Code
EN_RULE_ATTRIB_T.RULE_ATTRIB_LBL_TXT: Kuali Purchase Order Document Contract Manager Code
EN_RULE_ATTRIB_T.RULE_ATTRIB_XML_RTE_TXT: <searchingConfig> <fieldDef name="purchaseOrderDocumentContractManagerCode" title="kuali_dd_label(PurchaseOrderDocument)"> <display> <type>text</type> </display> <visibility> <column visible="false"/> </visibility> <searchDefinition dataType="long"/> <validation required="false"> <regex>^[0-9]{0,}$</regex> <message>Invalid Contract Manager Code Value. A valid contract manager code value must be numeric.</message> </validation> <quickfinder appliesTo="contractManagerCode" draw="true" service="workflow-org.kuali.module.vendor.bo.ContractManager-Lookupable(null)"/> <fieldEvaluation> <xpathexpression>wf:xstreamsafe('//document/contractManagerCode')</xpathexpression> </fieldEvaluation> </fieldDef> </searchingConfig>

EN_RULE_ATTRIB_T.RULE_ATTRIB_DESC: Attribute to identify the Vendor ID of the Purchase Order Document
EN_RULE_ATTRIB_T.RULE_ATTRIB_LBL_TXT: Kuali Purchase Order Document Vendor ID
EN_RULE_ATTRIB_T.RULE_ATTRIB_XML_RTE_TXT: <searchingConfig> <fieldDef name="purchaseOrderDocumentVendorId" title="kuali_dd_label(VendorGenericAttributes)"> <display> <type>text</type> </display> <visibility> <column visible="false"/> </visibility> <searchDefinition allowWildcards="false" autoWildcardLocation="suffixonly"/> <fieldEvaluation> <xpathexpression>substring(concat(wf:xstreamsafe('//document/vendorHeaderGeneratedIdentifier'), concat('-', wf:xstreamsafe('//document/vendorDetailAssignedIdentifier'))), number(not(boolean(concat(wf:xstreamsafe('//document/vendorHeaderGeneratedIdentifier'), wf:xstreamsafe('//document/vendorDetailAssignedIdentifier')))))*string-length(concat(wf:xstreamsafe('//document/vendorHeaderGeneratedIdentifier'), concat('-', wf:xstreamsafe('//document/vendorDetailAssignedIdentifier'))))+1)</xpathexpression> <!-- <xpathexpression>concat(concat(wf:xstreamsafe('//document/vendorHeaderGeneratedIdentifier'),'-'),wf:xstreamsafe('//document/vendorDetailAssignedIdentifier'))</xpathexpression> --> </fieldEvaluation> </fieldDef> </searchingConfig>

EN_RULE_ATTRIB_T.RULE_ATTRIB_DESC: Attribute to identify the Contract Name of the Vendor Contract on a Purchase Order Document
EN_RULE_ATTRIB_T.RULE_ATTRIB_LBL_TXT: Kuali Purchase Order Document Contract Name

EN_RULE_ATTRIB_T.RULE_ATTRIB_LBL_TXT: Kuali Purchase Order Document Transmit Date Range

EN_RULE_ATTRIB_T.RULE_ATTRIB_DESC: Attribute to identify the Purchase Order Status of the Purchase Order Document

EN_RULE_ATTRIB_T.RULE_ATTRIB_XML_RTE_TXT: <searchingConfig> <fieldDef name="purchaseOrderDocumentIncompleteStatuses" title="kuali_dd_label(PurApGenericAttributes)"> <display> <type>checkbox_present</type> </display> <visibility> <column visible="false"/> </visibility> <fieldEvaluation> <!-- following xpath expression should match to the status code --> <xpathexpression>wf:xstreamsafe('//document/statusCode')</xpathexpression> </fieldEvaluation> </fieldDef> </searchingConfig>

EN_RULE_ATTRIB_T.RULE_ATTRIB_DESC: Attribute to identify the Current Purchase Order Document
EN_RULE_ATTRIB_T.RULE_ATTRIB_LBL_TXT: Kuali Purchase Order Document Current Indicator

EN_RULE_ATTRIB_T.RULE_ATTRIB_LBL_TXT: Kuali Purchase Order Document ID
EN_RULE_ATTRIB_T.RULE_ATTRIB_XML_RTE_TXT: <searchingConfig> <fieldDef name="purchaseOrderDocumentPurchaseOrderId" title="kuali_dd_label(PurchaseOrderDocument)"> <display> <type>text</type> </display> <searchDefinition dataType="long"/> <validation required="false"> <regex>^[0-9]{0,}$</regex> <message>Invalid PO Nbr Value. A valid Purchase Order number value must be numeric.</message> </validation> <fieldEvaluation> <xpathexpression>wf:xstreamsafe('//document/purapDocumentIdentifier')</xpathexpression> </fieldEvaluation> </fieldDef> </searchingConfig>

EN_RULE_ATTRIB_T.RULE_ATTRIB_DESC: Attribute to identify the Previous Purchase Order ID field of the Purchase Order Document
EN_RULE_ATTRIB_T.RULE_ATTRIB_LBL_TXT: Kuali Purchase Order Document ID
EN_RULE_ATTRIB_T.RULE_ATTRIB_XML_RTE_TXT: <searchingConfig> <fieldDef name="purchaseOrderDocumentPreviousPurchaseOrderId" title="kuali_dd_label(PurchaseOrderDocument)"> <display> <type>text</type> </display> <visibility> <column visible="false"/> </visibility> <searchDefinition dataType="long"/> <validation required="false"> <regex>^[0-9]{0,}$</regex> <message>Invalid Previous PO Nbr Value. A valid Previous Purchase Order number value must be numeric.</message> </validation> <fieldEvaluation> <xpathexpression>wf:xstreamsafe('//document/purchaseOrderPreviousIdentifier')</xpathexpression> </fieldEvaluation> </fieldDef> </searchingConfig>

EN_RULE_ATTRIB_T.RULE_ATTRIB_DESC: Attribute to identify the Organization fields of a Purchasing & Accounts Payable Document
EN_RULE_ATTRIB_T.RULE_ATTRIB_LBL_TXT: Kuali Purchasing & Accounts Payable Document Organization
EN_RULE_ATTRIB_T.RULE_ATTRIB_XML_RTE_TXT: <searchingConfig> <fieldDef name="purapDocumentChartOfAccountsCode" title="kuali_dd_label(Org)"> <display> <type>text</type> </display> <visibility> <column visible="false"/> </visibility> <searchDefinition caseSensitive="false"/> <quickfinder appliesTo="chartOfAccountsCode" draw="true" service="workflow-org.kuali.module.chart.bo.Chart-Lookupable(null)"/> <fieldEvaluation> <xpathexpression>wf:xstreamsafe('//document/chartOfAccountsCode')</xpathexpression> </fieldEvaluation> </fieldDef> <fieldDef name="purapDocumentOrganizationCode" title="kuali_dd_label(Org)"> <display> <type>text</type> </display> <visibility> <column visible="false"/> </visibility> <searchDefinition caseSensitive="false"/> <quickfinder appliesTo="organizationCode" draw="true" service="workflow-org.kuali.module.chart.bo.Org-Lookupable(workflow-organizationCode:organizationCode,workflow-chartOfAccountsCode:chartOfAccountsCode)"/> <fieldEvaluation> <xpathexpression>wf:xstreamsafe('//document/organizationCode')</xpathexpression> </fieldEvaluation> </fieldDef> <fieldDef name="purapDocumentOrgDisplayValue" title="kuali_dd_label(PurApGenericAttributes)"> <display> <type>text</type> </display> <visibility> <field visible="false"/> </visibility> <fieldEvaluation> <xpathexpression>substring(concat(wf:xstreamsafe('//document/chartOfAccountsCode'), concat('-', wf:xstreamsafe('//document/organizationCode'))), number(not(boolean(concat(wf:xstreamsafe('//document/chartOfAccountsCode'), wf:xstreamsafe('//document/organizationCode')))))*string-length(concat(wf:xstreamsafe('//document/chartOfAccountsCode'), concat('-', wf:xstreamsafe('//document/organizationCode'))))+1)</xpathexpression> </fieldEvaluation> </fieldDef> </searchingConfig>

EN_RULE_ATTRIB_T.RULE_ATTRIB_XML_RTE_TXT: <routingConfig> <fieldDef name="vendorTypeCode" title="kuali_dd_label(VendorHeader)" workflowType="RULE"> <display> <type>text</type> </display> <validation required="false"/> <quickfinder appliesTo="vendorTypeCode" draw="true" service="workflow-org.kuali.module.vendor.bo.VendorType-Lookupable(workflow-vendorTypeCode:vendorTypeCode)"/> <fieldEvaluation> <xpathexpression>wf:xstreamsafe('//newMaintainableObject/businessObject/vendorHeader/vendorTypeCode') = wf:ruledata('vendorTypeCode')</xpathexpression> </fieldEvaluation> </fieldDef> </routingConfig>

EN_RULE_ATTRIB_T.RULE_ATTRIB_DESC: Requisition Content Routing Attribute
EN_RULE_ATTRIB_T.RULE_ATTRIB_LBL_TXT: Requisition Content Routing
EN_RULE_ATTRIB_T.RULE_ATTRIB_XML_RTE_TXT: <routingConfig> <fieldDef name="chartOfAccountsCode" title="kuali_dd_label(Org)" workflowType="ALL"> <display> <type>text</type> </display> <validation required="true"/> <quickfinder appliesTo="chartOfAccountsCode" draw="true" service="workflow-org.kuali.module.chart.bo.Chart-Lookupable(workflow-chartOfAccountsCode:chartOfAccountsCode)"/> <fieldEvaluation> <xpathexpression>wf:xstreamsafe('//document/chartOfAccountsCode') = wf:ruledata('chartOfAccountsCode')</xpathexpression> </fieldEvaluation> </fieldDef> <fieldDef name="organizationCode" title="kuali_dd_label(Org)" workflowType="ALL"> <display> <type>text</type> </display> <validation required="true"/> <quickfinder appliesTo="organizationCode" draw="true" service="workflow-org.kuali.module.chart.bo.Org-Lookupable(workflow-organizationCode:organizationCode,workflow-chartOfAccountsCode:chartOfAccountsCode)"/> <fieldEvaluation> <xpathexpression>wf:xstreamsafe('//document/organizationCode') = wf:ruledata('organizationCode')</xpathexpression> </fieldEvaluation> </fieldDef> </routingConfig>

EN_RULE_ATTRIB_T.RULE_ATTRIB_DESC: Purchase Order Transmission Method Routing Attribute

EN_RULE_ATTRIB_T.RULE_ATTRIB_XML_RTE_TXT: <routingConfig> <fieldDef name="purchaseOrderTransmissionMthdCd" title="kuali_dd_label(PurchaseOrderTransmissionMethod)" workflowType="ALL"> <display> <type>text</type> </display> <validation required="true"/> <quickfinder appliesTo="purchaseOrderTransmissionMethodCode" draw="true" service="workflow-org.kuali.module.purap.bo.PurchaseOrderTransmissionMethod-Lookupable(workflow-purchaseOrderTransmissionMethodCode:purchaseOrderTransmissionMethodCode)"/> <fieldEvaluation> <xpathexpression>wf:xstreamsafe('//document/purchaseOrderTransmissionMethodCode') = wf:ruledata('purchaseOrderTransmissionMthdCd')</xpathexpression> </fieldEvaluation> </fieldDef> <fieldDef name="purchaseOrderAutomaticIndicator" title="kuali_dd_label(PurApGenericAttributes)" workflowType="ALL"> <display> <type>select</type> <values selected="true" title=" "/> <values title="Automatic Purchase Orders Only">Automatic</values> <values title="Non-Automatic Purchase Orders Only">Non-Automatic</values> </display> <validation required="true"/> <fieldEvaluation> <xpathexpression>wf:ruledata('purchaseOrderAutomaticIndicator') = ' ' or (wf:xstreamsafe('//document/purchaseOrderAutomaticIndicator') = 'true' and wf:ruledata('purchaseOrderAutomaticIndicator') = 'Automatic') or (wf:xstreamsafe('//document/purchaseOrderAutomaticIndicator') = 'false' and wf:ruledata('purchaseOrderAutomaticIndicator') = 'Non-Automatic')</xpathexpression> </fieldEvaluation> </fieldDef> </routingConfig>
